content: पीयूषः --षं [पीय् --ऊषन्, <ls>Uṇ. 4. 76</ls>] {@--1@} Nectar, ambrosia; मनसि वचसि काये पुण्यपीयूषपूर्णाः <ls>Bh. 2. 78</ls>; इमां पीयूषलहरीं <ls>G. L. 53.</ls> {@--2@} Milk in general. {@--3@} The milk of a cow during the first seven days after calving. {@--4@} The first milk given by a cow after calving.
